notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: Conceived and designed the experiments: MC, YM, ZS and MJ. Collected the samples: MC, HC, JD, CY, LD, XJ, MY and LY. Performed the experiments: MC, HC, JD, CY, LD, XJ, MY and LY. Collected epidemiological data: YM, HL, LS, ZS and MJ. Analysed the data: MC. Wrote the paper: MC. Approved the final version of this manuscript: MC, YM, HC, JD, HL, CY, LD, XJ, MY, LY, LS, ZS and MJ.
